pasugiya palath sabha mathiwaranaye puththalama disthrikkaya sandaha nikuthkala , bhawitha karana lada chanda pathrika thogayak puththalama shantha andaෲ widyalayiya shalawe thibi hamuwi athi athara mewa hamuwimath samanga pradeshaye unusumkari thaththwayak hatagena atha.mema chanda pathrika hamuwu shantha andaෲ widyaliya shalawa mema mathiwaranaye puththalama disthrik chanda ganan kirime madhyasthana 55 pihita wu godanagili sankirna deken ekakieeye (24) dahawal ema godanagille pohora ura thunak thibenu daka ayek ee bawa wagakiwa yuththanta danwimen pasu pariksha kirimedi eewaye thibune pawichchi karana lada chanda pathrikama bawa heliwi thibe.ema chanda pathrikawalin wadi kotasak dekata madin irathibu bawa heliwi atha.puththalama disthrik lekam ha therimbhara niladhari kinsli pranandu, sahakara mathiwarana komasaris sumith chandana, kottasabhara polis adhikari anura abewikrama niladharinda athulu usas niladharin rasak pamina parikshana arambaa athi athara pradeshawasin wishala pirisak ee awata raswi siti nisa unusumkari thaththwayak athi wi atha.mathiwaranayata tharaga kala jayagath manthriwarun menma parada wu apekshakayan owunge aadhara karuwanda ekwa sitiyaha.samaya aaraksha kirima sandaha polis aarakshawa yodawa atha..
samange wruththiya kuli thriroda ratha padawimaya.

ehi dewani sthanaya shri lanka pabala hamudawe es.bi.madhurawa (mi.34.72) ha thewani sthanaya wijayaba rejimenthuwe sampath kumara (mi.33.66) dinagathha.kolambaa sugathadasa kridanganaye eeye aarambha wu yuda hamuda para krida ulelata siyalu rejimenthuwalata amatharawa wiyatnamaya, indiyawa, pakisthanaya, malesiyawa ha singappuruwa yana ratawalin aabadhitha yuda hamuda niladharin 15k pamana ekwa sitiyaha.eeye yuda hamuda para krida ulele prathama dinaye aaradhithaya lesa nawika hamudapathi wayis admiral jayantha perera mahatha ekwa sitiyeya.
